title: KLS Backup 2015 Professional 8.3.1.0 + Key [4realtorrentz]
description:
KLS Backup 2015 is a feature-rich and powerful application suite which provides powerful tools for data backup, restoration and synchronization. It also supports plugins for backing up email, applications and settings, the Microsoft SQL Server Database, MySQL Database, POP3/IMAP and disk images. These components can be selected during the installation procedure. Upon deployment, you may install an online backup service and log in with the local system or other account. The interface of the tool looks professional.

Software features:

- Creation of backup copies of files from local and network drives, Windows registry, FTP-servers
- Backup important files and data on your local, network drives, CD/DVD drives and FTP-servers
- Backup open and locked files
- Run as a Windows system service
- Advanced management of different versions of data
- Data synchronization on local, network, disks and FTP servers
- Easy to use user interface
- Support standard compressor ZIP, Zip64, 7-Zip and SQX compression formats
- Several different modes of backup
- Detailed log file and send by e-mail
- Integrated task scheduler
- Flexible recovery options
- And much moreâ€¦

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Run and use given details to register
3. Done
